context_bundle.summary: Helm: Kubernetes package manager. Charts bundle K8s manifests with templating. Key features: values.yaml for customization, dependencies, hooks (pre/post-install), rollback, chart repositories, OCI registry support. helm install/upgrade/rollback lifecycle.

onboarding.quick_start: Helm: 1) helm create mychart (scaffold), 2) Edit templates/ and values.yaml, 3) helm install myrelease ./mychart -f custom-values.yaml, 4) helm upgrade myrelease ./mychart, 5) helm rollback myrelease 1.

known_errors.error: UPGRADE FAILED: another operation in progress
known_errors.cause: Previous release stuck in pending-upgrade/pending-install state
known_errors.solution: helm history myrelease; helm rollback myrelease <revision>
known_errors.prevention: Use --atomic flag for automatic rollback on failure
